Today in Sutherland, expect fun surf at 3 ft @9s from the N with fresh 26 mph SSW winds. Good spots like Melvich and Strathy are working well, especially during their respective tide windows. Tomorrow, the swell picks up to 7 ft @13s from the WNW, with 18 mph S winds, making for some solid conditions. The day after, surf remains at 5 ft @12s W, with similar wind, still offering great options at spots like Melvich and Sango Bay. Best: tomorrow.
